QuestData.Title: Holding the Line
QuestData.Description: It is good to see you again, champion.$B$BDemons are assaulting Auchindoun and we are barely standing our ground against them.$B$BWe need to push our front lines forward lest our losses reach critical mass.$B$BIf your blade is with us, shove it into these foul creatures' throats.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay $1oa demons in the Burning Front.
QuestData.CompletionText: All of Auchindoun, and the countless souls within, depends on our success.
QuestData.RewardText: I only hope we are enough.
